class.name: de.act.common.types.staticobjects.RSDbmWsView
class.subselect: SELECT COUNT(a.dbm_id) AS total_smu, SUM(a.pcs) AS total_pcs, SUM(a.wgt) AS total_wgt, SUM(a.vol) AS total_vol, a.ca_name, a.ap_3lc_from, a.ap_3lc_to, a.dep_date FROM s_dbm_ws AS a GROUP BY a.ca_name, a.ap_3lc_from, a.ap_3lc_to, a.dep_date
